org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class ParentUiElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ParentUiElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlexUiElement, Hoverable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Div, TabView, UiContainer

    public abstract class ParentUiElement
extends UiElement
implements FlexUiElement
    Base class for UiElements that can contain child UiElements

        Returns:
